articles.headline: Regtech Awards Finalist for Export of the Year (Australian Founded)
articles.summary: LAB Group was a finalist in the RegTech Awards for Export of the Year, recognizing international growth and leadership in innovative onboarding solutions for global financial services.

articles.headline: Recognised by Fintech Australia for outstanding contributions
articles.summary: LAB Group received recognition from Fintech Australia for contributions to the fintech sector, highlighting commitment to digital onboarding and compliance solutions.

articles.headline: KordaMentha and LAB Group forge strategic partnership to deliver turnkey AML/CTF managed services
articles.summary: KordaMentha, an independent Australian advisory firm, entered a strategic partnership with LAB Group to deliver joint AML/CTF managed services combining LAB's RegTech platform with KordaMentha's expertise.

articles.headline: LAB Group secures AU$6.5 million in growth capital to scale and accelerate their growth strategy
articles.summary: Henslow acted as corporate advisor to LAB Group on their AU$6.5 million debt facility from Global Credit Investments (GCI). The funds will strengthen their team and accelerate growth strategy in RegTech for KYC and onboarding.
